about_the_game:
Dive into a world on the verge of being dominated by the rising wave of terrorists that only seek to thrive off the helpless innocents. You, the leader of task force Sunflower, are entrusted with nerve-wracking missions to crush their selfish dreams of ruling the world. Run through factories, shipyards, and even bullets to reach checkpoints that lead you closer and closer to the final boss. Sunflowers is a Rhythm Shooter VR game that intensifies the survival experience which will leave your palms sweating. Sunflowers raise the bar for VR gaming through its dynamic, compelling rhythm and action.

Sun Flowers focuses on:
- Immersive Gun Shooting
- Compelling action-oriented rhythm gameplay
- A stunningly detailed interactive virtual space
- Dynamically driven, replay focused game content
- A challenging skill-based player reward system
